content:
You're talking about a specific game, and I'm happy to help! However, I need to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have real-time access to current events or specific game details. My training data only goes up to 2022, so I won't know about recent games or events.

But, I can give you some general information about the sports bars I mentioned earlier. While they may not have a direct view of the court, they're all located near the Staples Center and offer a great atmosphere to catch a Lakers game on TV.

As for special promotions, it's best to check with each sports bar directly for their current offers and deals. They might have game-day specials, happy hour deals, or discounts on food and drinks during Lakers games. You can visit their websites, social media, or give them a call to ask about their promotions.

Some sports bars might also have VIP areas or private rooms that can be reserved for groups, which could include special perks like food and drink packages or dedicated service. It's worth inquiring about these options if you're planning to watch the game with a large group.

Remember to plan ahead, arrive early, and be prepared for a fun and lively atmosphere at any of these sports bars near the Staples Center!
